sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: The "superfeed" XML namespace adds support for additional fields used by Rivendell Superfeed RSS podcasting functionality.

sect1.title: Fields
sect1.para: The namespace adds the following fields:

listitem.para: The value of the <title> field from the <channel> section of the underlying elemental feed.
The value of the <description> field from the <channel> section of the underlying elemental feed.

sect1.title: Example
sect1.para: The following example posits the existence of two elemental feeds, AIRPLAY, CARTSLTS and LIBRARY; each containing a single post. A superfeed, called RIVENDEL and consisting of those three elemental fields would look like this:
